name: Flaming
description: The item bursts into flames on command, dealing fire damage.

name: Frost
description: The item is wreathed in freezing cold, dealing ice damage and potentially slowing enemies.

name: Shocking
description: The item crackles with electrical energy, dealing lightning damage.

name: Corrosive
description: The item drips with acid that eats through armor and flesh.

name: Keen
description: The weapon's edge is supernaturally sharp, increasing critical hit chance.

name: Defending
description: The weapon can be used defensively, providing a bonus to parrying.

name: Returning
description: The weapon magically returns to the wielder's hand after being thrown.

name: Vampiric
description: The weapon drains life force from victims, healing the wielder.

name: Ghost Touch
description: The weapon can strike incorporeal creatures as if they were solid.

name: Storing
description: Once per day, you can choose any rank 1/2/3 spell you know. This item stores the chosen spell within it. You can cast the spell once per day from this item without spending Focus.

name: Deflecting
description: While wielding this item, it cloaks you in a magical aura and gains +1 Parry as a property.

name: Glowing
description: This item can emit light with short range by speaking its command word (no Action required). Speaking the command word again extinguishes the light.

name: Stabilizing
description: Once per turn, if you fail to cast a spell, you can re-roll the test. You can use this ability once/twice/thrice per day.

name: Volatile
description: Once per turn, when dealing damage with a spell, you can choose to add +2/+4/+6 damage to it. If you do, roll a Durability check for this item.

name: Infused
description: While holding this item, you can use your Quick Action during your turn to regain up to 4/6/8 Focus. You can use this ability once per day.

name: of Protection
description: Provides a magical bonus to armor value or defensive capabilities.

name: of Fire Resistance
description: Grants resistance to fire damage and heat effects.

name: of Frost Resistance
description: Grants resistance to cold damage and freezing effects.

name: of Lightning Resistance
description: Grants resistance to electrical damage and shock effects.

name: of Strength
description: Enhances the wearer's physical strength and carrying capacity.

name: of Agility
description: Enhances the wearer's dexterity and reflexes.

name: of Intellect
description: Enhances the wearer's mental capabilities and magical understanding.

name: of Spirit
description: Enhances the wearer's willpower and spiritual fortitude.

name: of Speed
description: Increases the wearer's movement speed and initiative.

name: of Stealth
description: Helps the wearer move silently and remain hidden.

name: of Spell Storing
description: Can store one or more spells for later use without expending Focus.

name: of Magic Resistance
description: Provides resistance against magical attacks and spells.

name: of Regeneration
description: Slowly heals the wearer's wounds over time.

name: of True Sight
description: Allows the wearer to see through illusions and detect invisible creatures.

name: of Flying
description: Grants the wearer the ability to fly for limited periods.

name: of Elemental Command
description: Grants the wearer command over elemental forces and creatures.

name: of Spell Turning
description: Has a chance to reflect hostile spells back at the caster.
